20. The undertaking shall disclose the water and marine resources-related targets it has set.
21. The objective of this Disclosure Requirement is to enable an understanding of the targets the
undertaking has adopted to support its water and marine resources-related policies and address
its material water and marine resources-related impacts, risks and opportunities.
